fluid_condition.description: The fluid condition type to check the fluid state at the position.
fluid_condition.markdownDescription: The fluid condition type to check the fluid state at the position.

type.description:
## Fluid

---



[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/fluid)

Checks the fluid state of the current position with a [Fluid Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/fluid).

Type ID: `origins:fluid`




---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:fluid",
    "fluid_condition": {
        "type": "origins:still"
    }
}
```

This example will check if the block is a source fluid.
